sentences.en: Anning Basin is a terringenous fault basin developed in Mesozoic Era.
sentences.cn: 云南安宁盆地为中生代陆相断陷盆地.

sentences.en: Buried hills of Archaeozoic, Paleozoic and Mesozoic Eras developed well in the west part of Dongying Depression.
sentences.cn: 东营凹陷西部发育太古界 、 古生界及中生界潜山.

sentences.en: Danba area has undergone multiperiod deformation, metamorphism and magmatism since Mesozoic time.
sentences.cn: 丹巴地区自中生代以来经历了多期的变形 、 变质和岩浆作用.

sentences.en: Fossil members of the Ginkgophyta are common from rocks of Mesozoic age.
sentences.cn: 银杏通常在中生代时期的岩层中被发现.

sentences.en: In each of the terranes there are many Mesozoic Cenozoic remained basins which are overlapping basins.
sentences.cn: 各块体内发育了多个中新生代“残留盆地”,它们大多为“叠合盆地”.

sentences.en: Its heat reservoir is composed of Yanshanian granite - porphyry and tuff of Mesozoic.
sentences.cn: 热储由中生代燕山期花岗斑岩、凝灰岩组成.

sentences.en: Liaohe basin is a rift basin developed in the Mesozoic and Cenozoic.
sentences.cn: 辽河盆地是中、新生代发育起来的裂谷盆地.

sentences.en: Ludong fault depression was a sub - depression of Kailu, which had a fold - fault basement of anti - Mesozoic era.
sentences.cn: 陆东断陷是开鲁盆地的次级断陷, 形成于中生代,基底断裂可分为北北东向和近东西向两组.

sentences.en: Mammals arose from a fairly primitive reptile in the Mesozoic era.
sentences.cn: 哺乳类起源于中生代宛若原始的爬虫类.

sentences.en: Many collisions of considerable size and periods of supervolcanism occurred early in the Mesozoic era.
sentences.cn: 在中生代以前发生了许多次大规模的碰撞与大型的火山喷发.

sentences.en: Systematic study of the Mesozoic source rocks in the Qiangtang Basin.
sentences.cn: 系统地整理、分析、研究了羌塘盆地中生界烃源岩的特征.

sentences.en: The Badao deposit is a typical Mesozoic volcanic rock - hosting deposit.
sentences.cn: 八道金矿为延吉中生代火山岩型金矿中较为典型的矿床之一.

sentences.en: The deposit No.138 is of Mesozoic volcano - sedimentary transformation type.
sentences.cn: 138矿床是中生代火山 - 沉积改造型铀矿床.

sentences.en: The deposition velocity of Paleozoic, Mesozoic and Cenozoic assumes unimodal pattern.
sentences.cn: 在沉积速率分析曲线上,往往是古生代 、 生代和新生代呈单峰状态.

sentences.en: The group consists of more than 10 Mesozoic basins.
sentences.cn: 与油气有关的沉积地层主要是侏罗系和白垩系.
